original_text: The Lord Almighty has made this strong promise with the authority of his own name: ‘I will cause the enemy's soldiers to fill your cities. They will come like a big crowd of locusts. They will shout loudly when they take your city for themselves.’ A song to praise the Lord 51: The Lord Almighty has made this strong promise
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 자기의 목숨을 두고 맹세하시되 내가 진실로 사람을 메뚜기 같이 네게 가득하게 하리니 그들이 너를 향하여 환성을 높이리라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty has made this strong promise
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 주님께서 이 강한 약속을 세우셨다

sentences.original_text: with the authority of his own name
I will cause the enemy's soldiers to fill your cities
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 원수의 군사들이 너희 성을 채우게 하리라

sentences.original_text: They will come like a big crowd of locusts
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 큰 메뚜기 떼처럼 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: when they take your city for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너희 성을 자기 것으로 차지할 때

sentences.original_text: A song to praise the Lord 51
The Lord Almighty has made this strong promise
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 주님께서 이 강한 약속을 세우셨다
